commend.translation[0].definitions[0].de: to praise or approve of someone or something publicly
commend.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: The paper was highly commended in the UK Press Awards.
Inspector Marshall was commended for his professional attitude.
commend.translation[0].definitions[1].de: to tell someone that something is good or that it deserves attention
commend.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: Colleagues, I commend this report to you.
